content: * yellow example uses red heart super saver bright yellow * pink example uses big twist value bubblegum **color variation 3 as seen in the second photo ** the chunky example of this pattern measures 6 5 inches height by 5 inches width by 5 inches depth using the following gauge 16 single_crochet x 15 row = 4 inches all supplies remain the same except for the following replacements * super bulky 6 weight yarn in 5+ colors * yarn a orange example uses premier parfait chunky tangerine * yarn b blue example uses premier parfait chunky seaside * yarn c white example uses premier parfait chunky white * yarn d switch between 3 different colors * blue example uses premier parfait chunky seaside * yellow example uses premier parfait chunky sunshine * pink example uses premier parfait chunky bubblegum * 14mm black safety eyes x2 * pink yarn example uses premier parfait chunky pink lemonade * black embroidery floss doubled **terminology ** this free crochet birthday cake amigurumi pattern uses english us terminology * st sts = stitch stitches * chain = chain stitch * slip_stitch = slip_stitch * single_crochet = single_crochet * decrease = single_crochet 2 together over the span of 2 stitches also known as a decrease * half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet * popcorn = small popcorn∗ * blo = back loop only please note that this pattern is written so that each crochet stitch abbreviation is attached to a number such as 1sc 2sc etc this number denotes how many of that stitch is to be worked into the same stitch ∗please read through special instructions for this stitch before beginning as it may be unique for this crochet birthday cake pattern **follow us for more crochet content and amigurumi adventures ** https //virkadia com/ | blog https //virkadia etsy com | etsy https //www instagram com/virkadia | instagram https //www pinterest com/virkadia | pinterest https //www facebook com/virkadia | facebook https //www tiktok com/@virkadia | tiktok **thank you for all of your support **
